trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> 可以設定的選項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 可用來從型別或組件產生 XSD 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> 從結構描述文件中產生 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information about importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關匯入和匯出結構描述的詳細資訊，請參閱[結構描述匯入和匯出](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md)和[匯出類別中的結構描述](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 會使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 屬性來包含可在物件圖形中讀取的型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料合約和已知的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type (`Possessions`) to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> 類別的執行個體，並將型別 (`Possessions`) 新增至 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 屬性所傳回的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> then exports the schemas of the types, including the `Possessions` type added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 接著會匯出型別結構描述，包括加入至集合的 `Possessions` 型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定序列化代理。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> 介面的實作，可用來自訂特定型別之 XML 結構描述表示的匯出方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別集合，這個集合可能會在序列化或還原序列化期間遇到。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="KnownTypes" /> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="KnownTypes" /> 集合，其中包含可能會在序列化或還原序列化期間遇到的型別。

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這個集合中由 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> 指定之所有型別的 XML 結構描述表示都會匯出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 會使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 屬性來包含可在物件圖形中讀取的型別 (使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性設定)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料合約和已知的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> 類別的執行個體，並將型別新增至 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 屬性所傳回的集合。
